summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to Housing, establishing mandatory weatherization standards for existing single family to four-plex residential structures, amending Ordinance 106319 of the Seattle Housing Code by: Amending Chapter 3,, adding definitions; amending Section 1.02, setting forth an additional purpose and intent of said code; amending Section 1.03, refining the scope of said code; and adding a new Chapter 5A, setting forth mandatory weatherization standards.
